page.title: 08FARMING AND FARM SUPPLIES
page.content: the time.He owns 5 tractors,1 drill,1 plough,1 Combine Harvester,3 trailers 1 drier,1 sprayer,2 harrows and 1 roller.It is typical of local farms. He farms 618 acres of which roughly 250 acres are grass for his 680 breeding ewes,and 350 arable crops,a mixture of cereals. Farm supplies David Taylor is the owner of{TAYLOR {FARM SUPPLIES}.He has 10 local men working for him.He is well established and always has a stall at The Royal Cornwall Show.Trade is very good.There are 4 rival firms locally.He makes farm barns,leanto's and wooden things(like slides).The main sorts of buildings are farm buildings and sheds.
